languages.text: Даргонус стал оплотом порядка в Просторе. Отсюда отправлялись карательные экспедиции на запятнавшие себя миры, целые шпили занимали служители и бюрократы Империума. Вскоре на многих планетах фраза "человек с Даргонуса" стала обозначать устрашающего инспектора, наделенного властью и правом карать.

Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.
languages.original_text: Даргонус стал оплотом порядка в Просторе. Отсюда отправлялись карательные экспедиции на запятнавшие себя миры, целые шпили занимали служители и бюрократы Империума. Вскоре на многих планетах фраза "человек с Даргонуса" стала обозначать устрашающего инспектора, наделенного властью и правом карать.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. on many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. on many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

languages.text: 达戈努斯成为整个科罗努斯扩区秩序的堡垒。无数远征队从这里出发，前去净化受到污染的世界。达戈努斯的所有尖塔，都住满了来自帝国的军官与官方成员。很多行星上流传着一个新词，叫“达戈努斯来的人”，专门指代那些可怕的督察员，他们有权对违逆之人实施惩罚。
languages.original_text: Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯成为整个科罗努斯扩区秩序的堡垒。无数远征队从这里出发，前去净化受到污染的世界。达戈努斯的所有尖塔，都住满了来自帝国的军官与官方成员。很多行星上流传着一个新词，叫“达戈努斯来的人”，专门指代那些可怕的督察员，他们有权对违逆之人实施惩罚。

languages.text: ダルゴナスはエクスパンスの秩序の牙城となった。ここから制裁の遠征隊が汚れた惑星へと派遣され、また尖塔全体が帝国の役人や官僚に占領されていた。すぐに多くの惑星で「ダルゴナスから来た者」は罰を下す力を持った恐ろしい調査官を意味する言葉となった。
languages.original_text: Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスはエクスパンスの秩序の牙城となった。ここから制裁の遠征隊が汚れた惑星へと派遣され、また尖塔全体が帝国の役人や官僚に占領されていた。すぐに多くの惑星で「ダルゴナスから来た者」は罰を下す力を持った恐ろしい調査官を意味する言葉となった。

languages.text: Dargonus devint le bastion de l'ordre dans les Étendues. Des tours entières étaient occupées par des fonctionnaires et des bureaucrates de l'Imperium, et de là partirent des expéditions punitives vers des mondes impurs. Sur de nombreuses planètes, l'expression « un homme de Dargonus » désigna rapidement un inspecteur redoutable ayant tout pouvoir pour imposer un châtiment.
languages.original_text: Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus devint le bastion de l'ordre dans les Étendues. Des tours entières étaient occupées par des fonctionnaires et des bureaucrates de l'Imperium, et de là partirent des expéditions punitives vers des mondes impurs. Sur de nombreuses planètes, l'expression « un homme de Dargonus » désigna rapidement un inspecteur redoutable ayant tout pouvoir pour imposer un châtiment.

languages.text: Dargonus se convirtió en el bastión del orden en la Extensión. Desde allí se enviaban expediciones de castigo a los mundos corruptos, y los oficiales y burócratas del Imperium ocupaban agujas al completo. En muchos planetas, la expresión «un hombre de Dargonus» cambió de significado para referirse a un inspector aterrador capacitado para ejecutar condenas.
languages.original_text: Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus se convirtió en el bastión del orden en la Extensión. Desde allí se enviaban expediciones de castigo a los mundos corruptos, y los oficiales y burócratas del Imperium ocupaban agujas al completo. En muchos planetas, la expresión «un hombre de Dargonus» cambió de significado para referirse a un inspector aterrador capacitado para ejecutar condenas.

languages.text: Dargonus wurde zur Bastion der Ordnung in der Ausdehnung. Von hier starteten Strafexpeditionen zu befleckten Welten, und ganze Türme waren mit Beamten und Bürokraten des Imperiums belegt. Auf vielen Planeten meinte der Ausdruck "Ein Mann von Dargonus" schon bald einen furchteinflößenden Inspektor, der auch Strafen verhängen durfte.
languages.original_text: Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus wurde zur Bastion der Ordnung in der Ausdehnung. Von hier starteten Strafexpeditionen zu befleckten Welten, und ganze Türme waren mit Beamten und Bürokraten des Imperiums belegt. Auf vielen Planeten meinte der Ausdruck "Ein Mann von Dargonus" schon bald einen furchteinflößenden Inspektor, der auch Strafen verhängen durfte.

languages.text: Dargonus, Enginlik'teki düzeni koruyan kaleye dönüştü. Kirlenmiş dünyalara giden cezai keşif seferleri buradan demir alıyor, kulelerinin tamamını İmparatorluk memurları ve bürokratlar işgal ediyordu. "Ceza verme gücüne sahip korkunç müfettiş" anlamına gelen "Dargonus insanı" tabiri, birçok gezegende yaygın olarak kullanılmaya başlandı.
languages.original_text: Dargonus became the bastion of order in the Expanse. From here, punitive expeditions were dispatched to tainted worlds, and entire spires were occupied by officials and bureaucrats of the Imperium. On many planets, the expression "a man from Dargonus" soon came to mean a fearsome inspector with the power to impose punishment.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus, Enginlik'teki düzenin tabyası hâline geldi. Kirlenmiş dünyalara giden cezai keşif seferleri buradan çıkıyordu ve kulelerin tamamı İmparatorluk memurlarından ve bürokratlarından oluşmaya başlıyordu. Birçok gezegende, "ceza verme gücüne sahip korkunç bir müfettiş" anlamına gelen "Dargonus insanı" tabiri yaygın olarak kullanılmaya başlandı.
